Testimonials.title: The voice of our athletes
Testimonials.subtitle: The Clube Padel Caldas community keeps growing. See what they say about us.

reviews.name: Marcelo Pasco
reviews.content: Excellent infrastructure for Padel, courts in excellent condition. Family-friendly and pleasant atmosphere, great for watching good padel matches. 5-star technical team, you can grab a drink and they have the best toasted sandwiches in the region and surroundings.

reviews.name: Ana Martins
reviews.content: I started taking classes 3 months ago and the progress is remarkable. The coaches are super attentive and the environment is very family-oriented.

reviews.name: Pedro Costa
reviews.content: Top-notch courts and the bar has a fantastic view of the games. The best spot for post-game with the crew.

questions.q: How do I book a court?
questions.a: The fastest way is through our TiePlayer page. You can see real-time availability and book instantly. You can also call or send a WhatsApp message if you prefer.

questions.q: Is it necessary to be a member to play?
questions.a: No! Clube Padel Caldas is open to everyone. You can rent courts or take classes without being a member. However, becoming a member gives you access to reduced prices and priority booking.

questions.q: Do you lend rackets and balls?
questions.a: Yes. If you are just starting and don't have gear, you can rent rackets at our reception for a symbolic fee. We also sell balls and other accessories in our shop.

questions.q: Do you have classes for beginners?
questions.a: Of course! Our Academy has classes for all levels, from those who have never held a racket to competition level. You can book a trial class so we can assess your level.

questions.q: Do you have parking and locker rooms?
questions.a: Yes, we have free private parking right at the club's door. We also have full male and female locker rooms with showers.
You can cancel your reservation at no cost up to 24 hours before the scheduled time. Cancellations with less notice may be subject to the payment of the court fee.
